page.title: 02BLAENDULAIS PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Blaendulais Primary is the name of our school.We have 3 buildings ;a modern nursery/reception unit,an infants department and a junior department.The infants building celebrated its centenary in 1983 while the junior building is approximately 90 years old.The campus is shared with the Welsh medium primary school which also shares the canteen facilities for the school meals service.There are about 214 pupils in our school and most of them lie near enough to be able to walk to school.A small number live at the bottom end of{Seven Sisters}and need transport to school.About half the Welsh primary pupils are bussed from nearby villages.The pupils may attend our school from the age of 3+ and leave for secondary education at 11+.The L.E.A. is West Glamorgan.
